actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the maximum limitations on the amount deductible for pensions for the self-employed.

summary.text: Increases, under the Internal Revenue Code, the maximum limitations on the amount deductible for pensions for the self-employed from $2,500 or 10 percent to $7,500 or 15 percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the maximum limitations on the amount deductible for pensions for the self-employed.
